1: A song for going up to the Temple. Those who trust in the Lord are like Mount Zion. They will never be shaken. They will continue forever.
2: Like the mountains that surround Jerusalem, the Lord surrounds and protects his people now and forever.
3: The wicked will not always control the land of those who do right. If they did, even those who do right might start doing wrong.
4: Lord, be good to those who are good, to those who have pure hearts.
5: But, Lord, when you punish those who do evil, also punish those who have stopped following your way. Let Israel always enjoy peace!
